1.content:
When we last met Jim he was eating a feast with the Shilarians. He seems to be living comfortably now. I wonder how fat he's gotten? Lets find out. At a rural country mansion there was an elegant futuristic manner run by robots with a small, but rich Shilarian family, the father is a world famous chef & the mother happens to be a diplomat with earth for exchange of goods, tourism, & immigration. Unlike Earth, it was quite customary to force feed humans incredible amounts of Shilarian food & adopt them into Shilarian oonkas (the Shilarian word for family). Of course they needed to get their shots first, their FA shots that is. The FA shots slowly changes the brains feelings about weight gain into positive if they aren't already there. Once they get their shots they go into a hyperspace transporter. It demolecularizes particles for dimensional travel into the Traveler's Realm, where they go for a few hours in cryogenic sleep. They go a short distance in the Traveler's Realm, which is a long distance in outer space in our dimension, thus "teleporting" humans & organic matter to Shin within seconds of human consciousness & their good time.
By the year 2150, 20 years since Jim’s arrival on Shin, most countries in the world, including China, England, France, Mexico, Canada, Japan, Korea (now united), & of course America have learned how to bioprocess Shilarian food to make it safe for human consumption. “Safe” being a relative word as it still increased hunger levels & now most of Earth is living off of Shilarian food & plumping up quite nicely. The governments of the world are now sending humans who become ambassadors, tourists, or scientists on the Shin planet to be fattened up into guests who come home secretly.
Back to where I was about Jim, he was living lavishly with his new Shilarian wife named Enva (Shilarian for mistress of the pig). Humans on Shin are allowed to only have one wife, human, or Shilarian; but that wife can be one that is already married to another husband. He is now so fat that he would fill up an entire mansion (earthly mansion that is, Shilarian mansions are 100x bigger). He is constantly squeezed in between the walls of the rooms as he is now a blob of fat that is unable to do anything by himself. Most people would find this a boring existence, but Jim has come to love it, besides it has its perks according to him.
For starters, he never has to worry about nutrition since Shilarian food contains all the nutrition he needs. Then there is his hygiene, the mansion’s robots go in between his rolls & folds of fat to massage & clean it on a daily basis. His toilet business is no more since the Shilarian food completely gets used up, thus no waste. Though as for his waste producing organs, they have transformed to remove waste through harmless sweat constantly through every gland in the body except for the ones near his huge chins, neck, & head. Finally there is the amazing sex he has with his wife. Shilarians are able to go in between the heavy & liquid-like rolls of his fat & reach his, Johnson to have sex in many fun ways, even while eating. He is completely stuck in the walls & has the most intoxicating sex ever.
But whose life do you wanna see here?
1.title: Alien Ambassador, the Epilogue

11.content:
Jim was just reading a Shilarian magazine, he was especially looking at the pictures & articles about Earth. He hadn’t seen it in 20 years so he wasn’t familiar with any new cultures there. He was slightly dismayed at the thought of being so far away from home. You’re probably wondering how he was able to read a magazine with fat covering his eyes, let alone reach & hold one in the first place. Thanks to special optic sensors placed in his eyes that extend out to long lengths & tentacles coming out from the ceiling through telepathic relay from a chip in his head, he can read a magazine as if he were holding it in his hands. Then his wife Enva came in with some slice up meat. “Honey, I brought you some more food to fill out your body” she spoke through her translator.
“Yeah sure, bring it on here.” Jim spoke in a dull tone.
“Sweety, is there something wrong?”
“Oh nothing much, it’s just that, well, I’m feeling kind of homesick, that’s all. It’s been so long since I’ve seen my home planet, I was hoping I would make a difference for Earth & Shin.”
“Oh, but you have sweety. Your change has brought us Shilarians a new lifestyle & now we flourish by spreading our culture to humans to share our people & live in peace & harmony.”
“Well, I guess I never really thought of it that way before. I still want to see my home world though. There are also friends of mine I left behind. I want to see them again, talk to them, maybe show off my fabulous new body while I’m at it.
“Why of course I could take you back home. There may be a little problem taking such a beautiful fat man home, but no matter we’ll find a way somehow.” Then Enva dialed up a number on her wrist watch which acts as a phone to call a travel agency. “Hello, Ambassador Airlines are you there.”
“Yes, this is Ambassador Airlines speaking. How may we help you?” the operator asked in a courteous voice.
“This is Enva Finn (that’s my made up last name for Jim, keep it consistent) calling about a vacation to earth. My husband is ambassador Jim Finn, the first human ambassador to come to Shin & we were wondering if we could arrange for a trip to earth as soon as possible in earth time. Uh huh. Uh huh. Oh!” Enva heard some details over the phone & that was the end of the conversation as Enva hung up & told her husband the result. “Honey here’s the result…”
11.title: Jim's Homesick

“We’re going via the transmit system. We’re going to see your home planet. I can’t wait for you to introduce me to all your friends.”
“That’s great, but one problem Enva.” described Jim. “What will they think of my new form. I mean 20 years can do a lot to a guy. But this?” He said as he grabbed a piece of his flab via tentacles to make his point.
“Don’t worry sweety. In case you haven’t read the news, fatness is now the new health trend on your planet. Everyone is fat now on your home world. He had the hunger stop machine placed within his belly-button; it would halt his hunger throughout the moving process. Jim was being loaded into the teleportation machine, via crane & Shilarian hover-copters. They had a massive teleportation beam that would have made a giant iris & pupil on Shin’s surface. He was loaded on top of it along with a ship of dignitaries from Shin’s equivalent of the U.N. The process was finally complete astonishingly after 20 min., then they activated the teleportation machine. It started with a low whirring & humming, then came the crackling particles of the air & the vibration of waves throughout his jello-like body, & finally came the rush of traveling through the Traveler’s Realm. He felt a rush of energy that made him feel strong enough to stand on thin air, & I mean stand as in the air became solid & he could stand on it, not lay down. Then came the rush of gravity as they left the portal a few seconds later & he plopped back down onto his bubble butt.
The experience was too much to take for Jim, so he fainted from the rush of energy, the change in atmosphere, & most importantly, the exhaustion of standing up. He woke up again hearing,

12.content:
Steven has been living a fabulous, or should I say flabulous lifestyle ever since 20 years ago when he sent Jim into his final fate. What happened was that the Shilarians wanted to repay Steven for showing them their destiny in this universe.
It all started one day when Steven was managing Earth’s interstellar immigration & vacations to planet Shin when two Shilarians came up to him & spoke English asking him to test out this new medicinal plant they have discovered called Ibony & Evory. They were similar in composition but had opposite though adverse effects on the human body. Ibony caused loss of weight getting so close to the asymptote of 0 while not changing in size which made it a poison. Evory caused incredibly fast & powerful weight gain in humans, & some Shilarians as well. They fed him some of his well made chicken, he didn’t know however that this would be the last meal he’d have that wouldn’t be served through a tube. “Thank you for your help boys. I’m really grateful you’ve helped me with my work & made my life a success. I wonder whatever happened to Jim, he’s probably grown a lot. I wonder how he’s doing now that he’s worshipped as the first Fat One in their species.” While Steven was speaking his chair turned around showing his body.
Steven was apparently a paraplegic with specially floating wheelchairs meant to carry him around. He had apparently gone bald & gotten around to basically being skinny & hairless. Most people would be appalled by this, but Steven liked his new look, he wasn’t expecting it though to have improvement. As he turned around, Steven picked up some more pudding dessert from his dish. He didn’t know however that he just fell into the same trap that he put through Jim, thinking that they wouldn’t fatten him up because he brought them something sacred. Unbeknownst to Steven, there was a sedative & a newly made FA shot in there (now made for oral entry). As Steven fell asleep he was already at the new “chubby” stage which was 500 lb., obese which was 1,000 lb., morbidly obese was 2,000 lb. or 1 ton , & anything beyond 2 tons was extremely obese. How fat does Steven get by the time he wakes up?

1321312.content:
It was the year 2105, & I just came back from the candy shop. Boy was it delicious. I went on my bike without my helmet, (not my best choice) & pedaled onward when I bumped into a new friend & crashed my bike into him. "Ooomph!!!!"

"Sorry about that." I responded, still groggy from the experience. Then I opened my eyes and I saw a Shilarian extending one hand out to me to pick me up, & the other rubbing his throbbing forehead. As I was standing, I noticed my head hurt badly.

"Are you okay?" He asked.

"Not really my head hurts & I need to get home soon." I replied. "Owww!"

"Hang on let me carry you, I'm quite strong." he flexed & picked me up.

"'ts okay, it's not that bad you don't have to do that for me." I protested. "Don't worry, & besides you don't seem to be in any condition to move right now... So where do you live?" He asked.

"At the intersection of Maple & Elm" I groaned, then he picked me up piggy-back style despite my protests & carried me home. He knocked on the door & there came my parents.

"Oh Aaron, how did this happen & who's your friend here?" she asked tentatively.

"I don't know, he carried me here... head... hurting... bike... accident" I promptly fell out cold. Then I was put down in the car where my new friend came with me and my mom to make i'm okay. Next thing I knew I was in a hospital bed with a very fat human doctor, with several lean & trim Shilarian nurses over my bedside putting ice on my body & using weird scanners on me. Basically after a few hours, they told me I had to stay the night & I was left alone with my new friend of which I wouldn't be here without him. "So what's your name?"

"Oh where are my manners? My name is Shencho & I am visiting earth on a vacation with my family." Shencho responded. I put my hand out to ask a question when he said, "Before you ask in human years I would be around 9-years-old". Whoa, that's incredible, I knew there were other Shilarians out there, but I never knew they had kids my age here in town, let alone on earth in general."

"When's your birthday?" I asked.h

"Tomorrow... say once you get out of here, would you like to meet my family & friends. They're both human & Shilarian, & I'm certain that my family & Shilarian freinds have never met a human your age before. So what do you say. Will you & your family come?"

I thought about it, & said "Yes, I'll come Shencho."

"Great, no need for a present yet, just you showing up will make my day." Boy he was polite & nice. TIme skip forward...
1321312.title: Be careful Whom you Befriend

13213122.content:
I went with my mom & dad to Shencho's house which was really a large white glass & marble compound that seemed more wide than tall by a 5;3 ratio of feet, & there was at least hundreds of square feet in this little compound. It was a hot day & they had a private indoor pool with a barbecue next to it. Fortunately I brought my loosest swim trunks with my mom & dad wearing a bikini & a speedo (dad was buff). We brought some delicious hamburgers (i'm lactose intolerante, such a shame), & we were in for a shock when we reached the buffet table they hired for us. All the food was at least three times bigger than our burgers, even the appetizers & Shilarian food was huge, greasy, & fattening. I knew from my parents that Shilarians had large appetites & marathon fast metabolisms, but this was ridiculous, there was enough food to feet ten people 20 times over, & that was just the humans, the shilarians had even MORE FOOD! "Well it seems we came unprepared, We had no idea that Shilarian parties were so, well BIG..." My dad stuttered.

"What do you mean dad?" I asked confused as I tilted my head to the left & snapped out of my trance to realize that there were no humans coming. Though the Shilarians were all wearing new swim suits that were tightly fit over their lean & sculpted bodyies, though that still left everything to the imagination. I filed in & shook hands with them & noticed that even their hands & fingers were well sculpted, “Oh, that’s what you mean?”

Then I notice d Shencho come in with two familiar-looking Shilarians that were taller & more muscular than anybody I’ve ever seen. “Hi Aaron, these are my older brothers Shintus and Shanue (pronounced Sha-new-eh). It is tradition to start a party with the newest friends & their family enjoying some of our food.” We began eating, & soon ate more than five hamburgers. We then moved on to the chips & other entrees, such as hot dogs, steaks, & ribs from all kinds of farm animals, & after a thorough stuffing that left a bulge in our flat stomachs, we chatted for a while. “Did you enjoy the food?” Shencho asked.

“Yeah, though I’ve never eaten so much before, it feels, good. Say mom, can we stay the night, they’ve got plenty of room & it is a weekend.” I asked groggily.

“Well sure Aaron, as long as it’s okay with the parents…” mom winced then rubbed her belly to soothe he fullness. “Speaking of which, where are your parents, Shencho? We’ve seen your aunts & uncles, your big brothers, your Shilarian & human friends, but where are your mom and dad. We’d love to meet them.” Mom queried with a hint of suspicion.

“They’re busy tonight, but they’ll be here for the cake & presents” Shencho answered. “Now that we’ve finished eating & digesting, let’s dive in the pool.”

“Sure.” My parents & I responded.

“One, two, and THREE!” Shencho counted, & all the parents & all the kids (Shilarian & humans) dived into the enormously deep infinity pool. Shencho & I splashed around for a while, & after several hours, we got out & I felt a nasty pang of swelling in my stomach, mom & dad felt it too, though I didn’t realize it was right after we finished digesting all that deliciously fattening food. Great now let’s go in & watch a movie everybody. We went in slowly & realized we felt heavier & more tired with every step as we started to blink out of it & our newly found Shilarian friends carried us to the couch beds.

Uugghhh! What’s happening???? Did we eat too much Shencho?” I asked queasily.

“No, of course not Aaron. You & your family have much catching up to do” Shencho replied with a sly smile, “In fact, the catching up should be happening now.” Then Shencho pushed a button on his high-tech waterproof watch that I didn’t notice had a digital meter reading our bodies. It showed our current bodies from before we ate, & then it showed a strange sight, there were enormously super mega obese versions of ourselves that were beyond any size a human could be & then I noticed something. My shorts felt snugger & I couldn’t see past my moobs, wait what moobs.

“What’s happening daddy! I feel like I’m going to explode!!!” I shouted with a deep rumble in my normally squeaky prepubescent voice. Then my growth went straight to my arms & legs as they turned into wide tubes of dough swallowing my dainty hands & feet.

“Aaron! Aaron!!!” dad shouted. “What the hell is going on Shencho, did you drug our food?”

“No, you’re just reacting naturally to our high calorie food from the planet Shin. Our food is measured in a different unit & converts to a high number of human calories. One of our Shin calories is equal to about 3,000 human calories & you’ve just eaten enough food to immobilize you within half an hour. You’ll be our first fat friends to live with us on Planet Shin. We’ve been allowed to be your feeders & caretakers for all time.

“Wwwhaaat????” my mother queried to this strange surprise. “How come we’re still healthy? How will we go to the bathroom? How will our son engage with his other people if he’s immobile?”

“The food is perfectly healthy, just high in human calories. You could live indefinitely without going to the bathroom since all the food converts into fat without ANY waste products. You’ll have all the health & monetary wellfare ever needed on our planet under our care. You’ll never have to work again; physically or otherwise, maybe you can do what you want, as long as it doesn’t involve you physically moving, but you’ll still love your new lives. & to answer your last question, all other non-physical needs will be supplied by us & our servants once we get there but fore now enjoy the ride.”

Then to add insult to injury there came two more adult looking Shilarians, wearing nothing at all, & they had two 4,000 lb cakes, each looking to be about our current body weight, around two tons each, & I could only imagine the feeding nightmare that will ensue when they push it into our mouths. We tried to close our mouths, but with our growing bodies expanding by the second it was very clear we were losing our strength. “Aaah Aaron, Mary, Donovan” came the female Shilarian, “I’m Shoran & this is my husband Shiku... we’re Shencho’s parents & we brought the cake for everybody, two for our human guests & two for everybody else” Our eyes must have bulged out because they chuckled & then attached climbed our massive bodies, “Now now, not yet, but first we’ll get you all into good positions & you’ll be sleep fed. Now good night darlings.” Then they attached these weird head braces which attached a virtual reality console to my head, breathing devices up my nose, & a force-feeding chewing mechanism into my mouth. The moment they turned on the VR console, I saw a hypnotic swirly pattern reverberate all across my lines of sight & I started to feel the full effects of my meal & fell asleep.

So what happens next???

1341211.content:
Hi, my name is Tyler. I am a young adult in need in Illinois. I have been looking for a job for a while now, & then I hear about some chemical testing at the local food plant with our new alien allies, the Shilarians. I am so excited to work there, maybe I'll get lucky and find a boyfriend. Putting it simply I’m on the LGBT Spectrum. I really wish I could find a boyfriend, but the problem was that as a farm-grown country boy living in a growing metropolitan country, it’s not easy to find someone whom I can relate to. Then add the fact that no one knows I’m gay, not even my friends or folks, on account that the Midwest is known for more conservative trends on marriage & love, even to this day in 2050. But I do digress.

I’ve been fascinated with computers, even though with my strong physique, charmingly rugged body, & farmland upbringing, I should be working the fields or doing something physical with my life. The simplicity and complexity of all that could be done with machines was incredibly intoxicating to me. Then there was the fact that machines were used in everyday life, even on the farm. If I could be successful, I’d want to live a steady sedentary life with easy access to utilities like in the city. I guess you could say I was born in the country, but my heart belonged in the city. That puts me here to today, where I was testing out food products for human consumption after they have been harvested, along with life-support systems for humans involved with interstellar transit. That should give me enough money to move on out to the big city & get my life started, maybe I’ll make real friends with more liberal opinions, gay lovers, & perhaps start a family. Who knows, maybe I’ll get to meet one of those friendly aliens that I’ve heard so many good things about, the Shilarians.

I was let in by a well-mannered, asexual, holographic receptionist (it’s all the trends nowadays in high-tech facilities, even encroaching on the more rustic side of the country), & after signing my waiver, my new job had begun. I was shown to a large guestroom the size of my old house, where I’d be staying overnight for the duration of the testing. A male Shilarian scientist came in through the exceptionally wide-&-tall doors & introduced himself.

“Greetings Tyler, my name is Dr. Zanarex. As you can see I’m a Shilarian. Let’s get started on with a simple checkup… By the way, it says you still live with your parents. Are they aware of you taking this job?” Dr. Zanarex asked courteously, but to the point.

“Well um here’s the thing…” I stammered as I tried to come to terms with my deceptive plan & how Dr. Zanarex was going to help. Surprisingly he was my age if my understanding of alien aging is correct. But he acted much more professional. Maybe he was a young genius on his planet. Maybe Shilarians start their careers earlier than humans do. Regardless I was a bit uncertain if I could trust him. “I don’t want my parents to know because well, I need this job to move somewhere far away from them.”

“Oooh. I knew humans haven’t attained world peace, but why would you hide such a thing from your parents?” Dr. Zanarex inquired.

“Well you know how some part of the world, heck some parts of the country aren’t very tolerant of each other or different ideals, particularly involving sexuality.” I muttered half-heartedly. Earlier I had been so gung-ho into getting this job so I can start my adult life right. Now if he got the police or some other government agency involved, I’d be in big trouble. “To be blunt, I need this job so I can leave this little town, see the big city, & understand where I am on the LGBT Spectrum, sexuality.” It was incredibly tense and awkward after that.

“That’s quite alright Tyler” Dr. Zanarex responded with a warm and understanding smile. “When you signed that waiver, not only are you guaranteeing your payment, but you are also receiving Doctor-Patient Confidentiality. I’ll even help you with the move if it means so much to you, since well I’m gay too, but I can’t legally be your doctor after this because of ethical reasoning. But either way let’s get started on the experiment.”

info.brief_description: You ever met a feeder, online? How about in space? That's the big question
info.description:
If you don’t know this story I found online called Alien Ambassador, then here’s the hyperlink-http://j-p1.deviantart.com/gallery/?offset=48#/d1jl2cg. I am writing an interactive story that is in basis, an epilogue to it. Hope you enjoy. This is what’s happening, it’s been 2 decades since we last left our hero Jim who was tricked into eating Shilarian food to be fattened up by his vengeful co-worker Steve. The public never officially knew of this event & were told he was going to live there forever.
A few rules:
1. No tube feeding, at least not until they are immobile, I want to see force feeding or tricking the character to eat shilarian food in large amounts until their first few gorging sessions are over.
2. Sex is okay, as is any sexual orientation except transvestites, so be a little bit descriptive, but keep it in context of their future "expansion/inflation".
3. Try making up an interesting feeder lifestyle for the Shilarians in every chapter.
4. The humans can return to earth & go back, visit other planets, or even stay on Shilarian planets & colonies
5. While on Shin they will always eat Shilarian food (to prevent consumption of the planet humans aren't really immortal by eating shilarian food, though they do live longer & something has to be done with their body when they die, no vore).
